subject: Re: Removing #pragma
body:
On 6/12/07, Andy Lester  wrote:
>
> On Jun 12, 2007, at 1:39 PM, Allison Randal wrote:
>
> > Do we have any proof that it does speed up compilation with msvc?
> > Littering our code with "optimizations" for odd compilers is also
> > an unhealthy precedent.
>
> Darn you and your pragmatism!
>
> DO we indeed have proof of a speedup?
>
yeah, i hadn't gotten around to the testing, as i'm deep Deep *DEEP*
inside parrot looking for a gc bug preventing perl6 from working on
win32. if there's anybody out there with win32/msvc who can compare
build times of r18883 and r18884 that'd be great, m'okay?

otherwise i'll get to it when i get to it.
~jerry
